channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KY

item.title: Report X-2025020146
item.description:
Report X-2025020146

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-01
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE CONTAINING A FULLY REGULATED DANGEROUS GOODS WAS FOUND LEAKING AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY. DURING PACKAGE INSPECTION THERE ARE EIGHT CONTAINERS OF 1.8 LITER CELL WASH SOLUTION I / NA0H-D WITH ONE LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE. THE OUTER BOX IS UN SPECIFICATION PACKAGING WITH A CAO, DIAMOND LABEL, PSN, UN NUMBER, AND AN APPROPRIATE SHIPPER'S DECLARATION FOR DANGEROUS GOODS. THE PACKAGE HAD PREVIOUSLY PASSED AN ACCEPTANCE AUDIT AT THE ORIGIN FACILITY.
